title: Ronan Farrow | Michael Cohen Pay-to-Play Allegations; John Kelly's Immigration Comments: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the White House dealing with new revelations involving the president's fixer, Michael Cohen, and questions about its cruel policy of separating immigrant families.

Then, he talks to Pulitzer Prize winning author and journalist Ronan Farrow about Trump's high-stakes dealings with North Korea, the consequences of pulling out of the Iran deal and covering the sexual misconduct allegations against Harvey Weinstein.

Farrow continues the conversation backstage at Studio 8G with Late Night producer Henry Melcher exclusively for this podcast.
